overview: From 2025-10-26 to 2025-11-02, Sendo-labs/frontend had 5 new PRs (4 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: privy
topPRs.author: Neysixx
topPRs.body:
This pull request introduces Privy authentication into the project, enabling both client-side and server-side user authentication and session management. The main changes include adding Privy configuration, integrating Privy libraries, implementing login/logout UI components, and providing server utilities for session validation. Below are the most important changes grouped by theme:

**Authentication Integration**

* Added Privy configuration variables (`PRIVY_APP_ID`, `PRIVY_APP_SECRET`, `NEXT_PUBLIC_PRIVY_APP_ID`) to `.env.example` for environment setup.
* Installed Privy libraries (`@privy-io/node`, `@privy-io/react-auth`) in `package.json` for both server and client authentication flows.

**Client-Side Authentication UI**

* Created `LoginButton` component in `src/components/auth/login.tsx` using Privy hooks for login/logout, and integrated it into the navigation bar (`src/components/navigation.tsx`). [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-596571a44c8e8edb3221c177f36432f0d6708a75cd5950c797525d3e1d3e23c0R1-R24) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-d9fcccb82e22d45c50029699d79f97851782bbf5a470a6802036498af5158394R8) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-d9fcccb82e22d45c50029699d79f97851782bbf5a470a6802036498af5158394R62) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-d9fcccb82e22d45c50029699d79f97851782bbf5a470a6802036498af5158394R95)
* Added a debug component `TestIdentityToken` in `src/components/auth/test-identity-token.tsx` to display and verify the Privy identity token for development purposes.
* Updated `button.tsx` to include a new `nav-link` variant for consistent authentication button styling.

**Provider and Session Management**

* Wrapped the application in `PrivyProvider` in `src/lib/providers.tsx` to enable Privy authentication context and configuration throughout the app. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-e16265e92ff2fc58a3353f4c3ecf74daa6c8d51e6f726e8f53d7820a4af5d650R4) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-e16265e92ff2fc58a3353f4c3ecf74daa6c8d51e6f726e8f53d7820a4af5d650R26-R44)
* Added server-side Privy client initialization in `src/lib/auth/privy.ts` and implemented the `getServerSession` function in `src/lib/auth/session.ts` for validating tokens and retrieving authenticated user information. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-a5d2805c79a05472d51e7b7e75e291b5df570fa3c0aa27cda96af247696025deR1-R12) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-8adb4fe17fbd9a162c4d504aaacfe2794e641de01fb28d5db323d8c74be2910cR1-R47)

**Server-Side Action Wrapper**

* Introduced `withAction` utility in `src/lib/wrapper/with-action.ts` to streamline server actions with authentication and error handling, leveraging the new Privy session management.

topPRs.title: feat: chat agent
topPRs.author: Neysixx
topPRs.body:
This pull request introduces a significant update to the agent chat functionality in the application. The main change is the replacement of the old `AgentPanel` component with a new, feature-rich `AgentChat` component, which provides an interactive chat interface for users to communicate with their AI agent. The new component improves user experience with enhanced UI, authentication handling, message animation, and agent status feedback.

**Agent Chat UI and Functionality Improvements:**

* Added a new `AgentChat` component in `src/components/agent-chat.tsx` that provides a floating chat button, animated drawer panel, message list with markdown animation, agent status indicators, and error handling. This component replaces the previous `AgentPanel` and integrates with authentication and agent state hooks for a seamless chat experience.
* Updated `src/app/layout.tsx` to import and use `AgentChat` instead of `AgentPanel`, ensuring the new chat interface is available across the application.

topPRs.title: feat: agents-creation
topPRs.author: Neysixx
topPRs.body:
- Adjusted indentation for the TestIdentityToken component in Home.
- Simplified the Worker component's props destructuring for better clarity.
- Enhanced formatting in the Worker component's AlertDialog for improved readability.
- Removed unnecessary newlines in various files to maintain consistent formatting.

topPRs.title: refactor: update worker client and analysis handling to improve data fetching and remove deprecated components
topPRs.author: Neysixx
topPRs.body:
This pull request refactors the worker analysis and actions workflow, streamlining the polling logic and improving the user experience for waiting states. It removes the manual "suggest" button and replaces it with automatic polling for analysis and actions, updating both backend calls and frontend components to match. Additionally, it cleans up imports and props across several files for consistency and maintainability.

**Worker analysis and actions polling improvements:**

* Replaced manual analysis creation (and removed the `WorkerToggle` suggest button) with automatic polling for worker analysis and actions in `src/app/worker/client.tsx`. Polling occurs every 2 seconds until data is available, and a new loading state (`isWaitingForAnalysis`) is introduced to track this. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L128-R137) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L153-R185) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L272-L273) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L111-R117) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34R292) [[6]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L385) [[7]](diffhunk://#diff-d8a332e10e11f0fd168c5f3a592bf9d65600382cebd064b5f26fabe17ade6ffbL1-L34)
* Updated backend service calls to use new method names: `getAnalyses` and `getActionsByAnalysisId` replace the older `getWorkerAnalysis` and `getWorkerActionsByAnalysisId` in both server and client code. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L128-R137) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L153-R185) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-083a864383578fb7f3d00c18444153c6311b62a7e2f3d3708c6c4ef180d41005L43-R49)

**User experience enhancements:**

* The `AnalysisPanel` component now displays a loading spinner and status message while waiting for analysis, improving feedback to the user during polling. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-663dc3c6e41a4ff7eec6ddeb922198ce2ac27b79702f501422000d6eba57002cL3-R11) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-663dc3c6e41a4ff7eec6ddeb922198ce2ac27b79702f501422000d6eba57002cL23-R37)
* Removed the full-screen loader and manual analysis creation button, as analysis is now created automatically. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L385) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-d8a332e10e11f0fd168c5f3a592bf9d65600382cebd064b5f26fabe17ade6ffbL1-L34)

**Code consistency and cleanup:**

* Cleaned up imports and prop usage across multiple files, including removing the unused `userId` prop from `ActionList` and updating import orders for clarity. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-c172c41dd0e3c85674141d5b3ef3394342fe9f6b46a0f0b558774184782715f5L3-R3) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-c172c41dd0e3c85674141d5b3ef3394342fe9f6b46a0f0b558774184782715f5L14) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-c172c41dd0e3c85674141d5b3ef3394342fe9f6b46a0f0b558774184782715f5L41-R41) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L299) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-20ed7f89df08f1bc63addf331680bcbecded8386364bc8ec824aecdf1cc49c34L32-R36) [[6]](diffhunk://#diff-083a864383578fb7f3d00c18444153c6311b62a7e2f3d3708c6c4ef180d41005L2-R7) [[7]](diffhunk://#diff-663dc3c6e41a4ff7eec6ddeb922198ce2ac27b79702f501422000d6eba57002cL61-R72) [[8]](diffhunk://#diff-ac395cc93cd290a4ce4a829afccd499f9b0469366cea735f54da176765a954d8L1-R2) [[9]](diffhunk://#diff-84a2affba03ed7738f322d153542928a7e8b209d72ebacd558860f002325c9d6L1-R1) [[10]](diffhunk://#diff-20ffa1831ebf06b95a23b427ac0d32a1d48b459df785f16277384897a51ee7e9L3-R3) [[11]](diffhunk://#diff-39cb33bf75f1459993724eb9889c54da86595fc180c838d4339fd56bcc7bc28aL3-R8) [[12]](diffhunk://#diff-e16265e92ff2fc58a3353f4c3ecf74daa6c8d51e6f726e8f53d7820a4af5d650L3-R4) [[13]](diffhunk://#diff-8adb4fe17fbd9a162c4d504aaacfe2794e641de01fb28d5db323d8c74be2910cR1-L3)

**Backend session and provider updates:**

* Minor adjustments to session and provider files for correct import order and type usage. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-8adb4fe17fbd9a162c4d504aaacfe2794e641de01fb28d5db323d8c74be2910cR1-L3) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-e16265e92ff2fc58a3353f4c3ecf74daa6c8d51e6f726e8f53d7820a4af5d650L3-R4)

Overall, these changes automate the workflow for worker analysis and recommended actions, improve feedback during waiting periods, and clean up the codebase for better maintainability.
